rukus.text: And when Moses said to his people, "O my people ! remember the favour of God upon you when He appointed among you prophets and He made you kings and gave you that which He did not give to anyone (else) in the worlds
O my people ! enter the holy land which God has prescribed for you and do not turn on your backs, (and if you do so) then you will turn back as losers
They said, "O Moses ! there are people therein who are exceedingly strong, and we will not enter it till they go out from it, but if they go out from it then we will enter

Two men, from among those who feared (God) and whom God had favoured, said, "Enter upon them through the gate, so when you enter it then you will be victorious, and put your trust in God if you are believers
They said, "O Moses ! we will never enter it while they are in it, so you and your Lord go and fight, we will certainly sit here
He said, "My Lord ! I do not have control except on myself and my brother, so effect separation between us and the transgressing people
He said, "So the (land) will be forbidden to them for forty years, they will wander in the earth, so do not grieve for the transgressing people
